definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I was surrounded by sky-blue silk and polished lacquer .
sentences.chinese: 我被天蓝色的绸子和光亮的漆器包围着。

sentences.english: Moon lights made the sea gleam like satin.
sentences.chinese: 月光把海水照得像绸子一般。

sentences.english: Kate's, what, dress, silk, colour, is.
sentences.chinese: 凯特的绸子连衣裙是什么颜色？

sentences.english: My coat is lined with silk.
sentences.chinese: 我这件外衣是用绸子做的衬里。

sentences.english: She piped the skirt with blue silk.
sentences.chinese: 她用蓝绸子给裙子滚边。

sentences.english: I was surrounded by sky-blue silk and polished lacquer.
sentences.chinese: 我被天蓝色的绸子和光亮的漆器包围著。

sentences.english: They were pink. And satiny. And you know what?
sentences.chinese: 粉色的，还是绸子的，你知道吗？

sentences.english: Wrinkled skill will flatten out again if you iron it .
sentences.chinese: 变皱了的绸子，如果经过熨烫可以再变平。

sentences.english: Why are you dressed up in a silk dress ?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么要穿一身绸子？

sentences.english: There ‘s something wrapped up in this piece of silk .
The tailor lined the coat with silk.
sentences.chinese: 裁缝用绸子做外衣衬里。

sentences.english: You may as well make his coat of a small remnant of silk.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用剩下的丝绸给孩子做件绸子上衣。

sentences.english: Both the colour and pattern of this printed silk are very subdued and in good taste.
sentences.chinese: 这块绸子的花色很淡雅。

sentences.english: You could back your dress with silk.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用绸子作衣服衬里。

sentences.english: The wrinkled silk will flatten out again if you iron it.
sentences.chinese: 皱了的绸子，你如果熨一下，可以变平的。

definition: coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
